# Text Formatting

### Jared uses underscores `_` for italic and bold.

_italic_ 

__bold__

___italic and bold___

### Does it look the same when we use asterix `*` instead?

*italic*

**bold**

***italic and bold***

### Yes, it does!

oh no! The ==highlighted== syntax does not work!

But we have ~~strikethrough~~ text! Great!
